item.title: Slate Star Codex scrapes and ebooks
item.description: I’ve been reading Slate Star Codex for a few years now, and recently got a Kindle ereader. So naturally I thought it’d be a good idea to scrape SSC and convert the scrape into a set of ebooks. You can find the resulting code and scrape (as of 201122) at my Github or below. In particular, you will find a set of .docx files as well as some .mobi ereader format files.

item.title: Recently Read
item.description: Here’s a non-exhaustive list of some of the books I’ve enjoyed recently. If it’s on here, I’d recommend it! Sci-fi, including, Dune and sequels by F. Herbert, Lilith’s Brood by Butler, The Book of the New Sun by Wolfe, The Book of the Long Sun by Wolfe, History, including, The Martyrdom of Man by Reade, Dynasty by Holland, Philosophy, including, The Gay Science by Neitzsche, A Guide for the Perplexed by Schumacher, Non-fiction, including The Wealth of Nations by Smith, Animal Behavior by Alcock, Anarchy and the Law by Stringham.
